title: Air Fryer, Bagotte Programmable Hot Airfryer Oven & Oilless Cooker for Roasting, LED Digital Touchscreen, Nonstick Basket, Dishwasher Safe, Family Size
features:
Make sure this fits
                by entering your model number.

„ÄêFAMILY SIZE & OILLESS COOKER„ÄëBagotte digital air fryer cooks by circulating hot air instead of oil. Keep the food being delicious the same as deep frying, but reduce oil by 80%. Low fat and cook faster. 3.7 QT capacity meets the needs of the whole family. Perfect healthy gift for food-loving family, lovers and friends.

„ÄêONE-TOUCH COOKING & DO MORE THAN FRY„Äë Select by just one touch of the screen instead of turning knobs. You can easily fry, bake, roast and grill using only one appliance. Wide temperature range: 180¬∞F‚Äì380¬∞F and time: 0-60 minutes based on the food. French fries, crumbed chicken tenderloins, turkey, rotisserie, all become very easy to cook!

„ÄêNONSTICK BASKET & DISHWASHER SAFE„ÄëRemovable nonstick basket are Dishwasher Safe. Made from all food-grades materials, BPA-free, ETL/FDA certified, so have peace of mind while you cook. And it also have a cool touch handle, independent vents, free from smoke, you will have a good cooking experience.

„ÄêCOMPACT & SAFETY PROTECTION„ÄëSmaller volume in the same capacity, saving your kitchen space. Auto shut off & Auto Memory function, when your food is done, the electric air fryer in kitchen will stop working automatically. Meanwhile make a sound to remind you.

„Äê3 YEARS WARRABTY & RECIPE COOKBOOK„Äë3 years Warranty! Just contact Bagotte customer service if any issues happened. And the recipe helps you prepare your favorite dishes! Choose from a variety of meals to make for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really Convinient Modern Way to Cook
reviews.reviewText:
¬†This air fryer can do everything I need it to do. It makes very crispy french fries, frozen or homemade. No need to use oil, however I have found a little bit never hurts if you're using a light oil spray. The cooking basket is non-stick. The device is easy to use and not overly complicated. Simply select a preset cooking time/temp or create your own.

I have found you can set the cooking time from 1 minute all the way to 60 minutes. The temperature ranges from 180 degrees Fahrenheit to 380 degrees Fahrenheit. It will fit up to 3.7 quarts of food, but I'd recommend not overfilling it for good air circulation.

I've been using the air fryer often for breaded chicken, french fries, reheating pizza, pizza rolls, and burritos. It says you can cook a steak in this, but I don't think I'd ever try that. Air fryers seem to work best with any food intended to have a crunchy or crispy outside coating.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gives a great texture to food and eady to clean and use.
reviews.reviewText: I am totally blown away by this air fryer!! It is totally amazing. I started the day frying my bacon in it and then reheating waffles. Im amazed at how much stuff you can cook in it. I got rid of my toaster because it replaces that completely. I cooked chicken thighs in it for lunch and they taste like fried chicken! It heats up really quickly and doesnt make your whole house hot like an oven does. It's great at heating up leftovers and gives food a nice texture . You want to make sure you use an oil sprayer to spray your food and not a nonstick cooking spray because the cooking spray will damage the nonstick lining of the airfryer. This airfryer is also really sinple to use. I suggest joining an airfryer group on facebook for tips, tricks and recipe ideas. Overall Im very pleased with this airfryer and it's a very useful appliance!

reviews.reviewTitle: Now I understand all the buzz
reviews.reviewText: I decided to jump on the air fryer bandwagon and see why everyone loves air fryers. I was happy with the size of the basket to hold enough food to feed my family of 4. I started with an easy recipe of just quartered red potatoes. They cooked quickly and were crispy. My 5 year old who often complains about eating almost anything other than pasta said I should open a restaurant. I've cooked chicken and fish from frozen in the air fryer. The fryer is super easy to clean, which is important to me. I highly recommend it as long as you have the storage space for it as it is a fairly large appliance.

Item arrived on time and in excellent condition. It works extremely well. The rectangular basket holds a surprisingly large amount of anything. It cooks things just as well as baking in the oven. The chicken wings I made last night would have taken over an hour in my oven. They were done in 20 minutes in the air fryer. Wings was so crispy and delicious. I‚Äôm going to try fried pickles next. This air fryer has six preset buttons and you can adjust the time and temp to which is really good. It has auto off, memory function, LED digital touch screen. This air fryer runs quietly. It‚Äôs easy to clean it‚Äôs dishwasher safe. The instruction is easy to understand and it comes with a little recipe book. Seems to be of great quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText:
This is my first time using air fryer, it is hard to control the time for the first time. You can google or YouTube the receipt online, or you can read the original receipt book from the package. I would love to recommended this brand, Philip is expensive for me and i checked on YouTube before buying this brand. There have lots of videos to introduce this product and get many positive reviews. Here are the reasons why I would recommended the most!
1. You could easily to change the time and temperature! you can stop it immediately if you want to.
2. Easy to clean! You can just take it off the inside and wash.
3. It have sounds but no let noisy, and the smile just like microwave, no heavy smell even you are cooking garlic or ginger. However, the air fryer doesn‚Äôt work for popcorn. Don‚Äôt treat him like a microwave!
I think $100 is good for huge amount air fryer, and I click 10% off coupon and save the money. The shipping come in fast and no damages. I would recommended this brand of the air fryer.

This is a good air fryers. I bought this air fryer so that i can make French fries at home since my parent very strict on fried foods because it is oily and unhealthy. With just a little touch up of oil, a couple try to get a hang of the timer, my friend fried came out nice, creispy. My sister also love the air fryer. She uses it to cook all her favorite frozen foods and the floods came out way better than in the oven. The air fryer is quiet when heating up and during cooking. I love the printed multiple cooking presets, it is detail and easy to follow so i do not need to look at the cook book all the times.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to clean large air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an air fryer for the last six months. I wanted something large, easy to use, and dishwasher safe. This one fit the bill. It is dishwasher friendly. Large enough to make batches of food. So far I have made kale chips (see pics) and sweet potato fries! I love that this came with a recipe book. Also there is a one year warranty.

So to give a little background, I am 60 years old, a doctor, work 2 jobs, hate cooking, can‚Äôt cook, and everyone who knows me would never eat any of my food except cereal or Tito‚Äôs with Orange Juice. Add to that I don‚Äôt like Donald Trump, doing dishes, or taking time to cook. A patient of mine mentioned that her whole family only airfrys. So I bought a machine, put in a steak, poured barbecue sauce on top, pressed the steak program, and had the best steak of my life in 8 mins. Absolutely crazy. The second steak I made a mistake, got a phone call, left it in too long, even better. I do not even want to go out to eat anymore because I can cook better.

reviews.reviewTitle: It‚Äôs a must have! Great product!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome air fryer! So glad I purchased this. It arrived in a timely manner. It makes cooking fries and what not so much healthier because you aren't frying them in grease. I can‚Äôt wait to try more recipes in this. I love the fact that it came with a recipe book as well to give me many more ideas for trying new things in this new air less fryer. It‚Äôs very quick and very easy. Everyone needs one!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice easy way to fry without oily mess!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I am late to the air fryer bandwagon. I did a lot of research, and read a lot of reviews. This one seemed to be the one with the best reviews and the least number of BAD reviews. I unpacked it and cooked spring rolls first. Never had them so crispy without hot oil!! Next I did chicken strips (fresh of course) and they turned out perfectly!! My grandson asked for seconds, then thirds. He NEVER asks for seconds!! No greasy mess!! I let the parts cool, washed and air dried, and it is ready to go. But it is BIG!! Now to rearrange my counter!! I will be keeping this!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast, delicious, easy to clean, wide variety of cooking options
reviews.reviewText: This has made my life much easier! The food produced tastes much better and is much more healthier! The machine is very easy to use and it makes cooking foods a lot cleaner. It's also very easy to clean and easy to understand. There is such a wide variety for preparing dishes including heating up food, baking, frying, etc. The air fryer has your food ready within a fair amount of time, so it really helps make a quick and delicious meal, saving you a lot of time. I highly recommend it, as it has definitely helped me create dishes much faster.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's so convenient and healthy. Help reduce a lot of oils from regular fry
reviews.reviewText: I'm a person who's working out so hard to reduce my body fat as much as possible. However, the body fat can reduce 30% from working out and 70% from what I eat. I love fried chicken a lot, but it has too much oil to fry and it's unhealthy for me. I've been using almost a month now, I'm really satisfied with it. Moreover, it helps me to save a lot of time too, I just have to set it up at the timers for each food I fry, I don't have to sit there and wait to make sure it will be over cooked.

reviews.reviewTitle: Make Breakfast Everyday for my childrenÔºÅEasy and FastÔºÅ
reviews.reviewText: ¬†As general working parents, we don't have more time to spend in preparing breakfast for our children. Now I brought a air fryer for them. Over this month every morning, I used fryer to cooking bread,corn dogs,french fries,dumplings,chicken nuggets etc. My children were so happy they can eat more kinds of breakfast, and tasted so good! And I will try more things for the add-on recipes. It just need setting temperature and minutes then press cook, it's fast and easy to use it!

This is my first air fryer, I love it. After I bought this air fryer, I almost use it everyday. Cook fries, chicken nuggets, spring roll, shrimp. It is so easy to use, just select the number from the manual, you even don‚Äôt need to input time and temperature. Everything take around 15 minutes. When you prepare something else, it is already done for the cooking. Cleaning is also easy, I just use water to wash it. I really love this air fryer, so convenient to use. Best purchase!

After i watched a video how air fryer cook chicken wings. i like to eat fried chicken wings. so i bought this one. when it arrived , i tried to cook chicken wings with spicy sauce , Wings was so delicious: crispy and hot. I‚Äôm going to try fried potato chip with Onion, i don't need to watch and take care all the time,It has auto off, memory function, LED digital touch screen. i can do another things in same time. It‚Äôs easy to clean. great quality!

reviews.reviewTitle: Air fryer.... You will love it!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this air fryer about three weeks ago! After seeing my friend use it, I decided to buy one for myself! It arrived pretty fast. After I received the product,I can‚Äôt wait to use it! I used the air fryer to cook salmon, chicken wings, potatoes, and chicken breast! The chicken breast tasted so much better than boiled it or pan fried it! The meat wasn‚Äôt dry at all. It has the original taste and so much healthier than the pan fry! The food tasted fabulous without putting oil on it! The product is very easy to clean! I just put some water inside the container and few drops of dish soap and let it set for few minutes. Than I washed it off! It‚Äôs fast and easy to clean and use! You won‚Äôt be regret it to buy this product. This product help me save time because I don‚Äôt have to keep eyes on it. I set the timer and the temperature than press start button, it will start to cook and I can go do my own things! I highly recommend this product! You will love it! [Áà±ÂøÉ][Áà±ÂøÉ]

This air fryer is a game changer for me because I love fried food but the calories concerns me so air fried food is a nice middle ground for me. I‚Äôve tried frying some spring rolls and french fries so far and they are just as crispy as the deep fried ones. The pot for the air fryer is lined with non-stick materials, which makes cleaning it easy and effortless. The LCD screen is sleek and modern-looking. Overall, I am happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewTitle: It is very easy to use and fast
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to use and the fact that I use it on a daily basis whether I'm making the kids cheese fries for a snack, potato skins, meatballs, potatoes, chicken fingers, etc! I'm still finding new things to cook. The only con is I had to reconfigure some of my own personal recipes to make sure chicken or hamburger meat doesnt get dried out. I still love it. It definitely has plenty of room for a family of 4. I made 4 good size stuffed chicken breast at one time. Buy it you wont regret it! I do a lot of grilling in the summer but I don't like cooking meat indoors because of the smoke and grease that gets everywhere. This air fryer does not smoke and grease does not escape. Everything I have made so far has come out very well cooked and delicious. It's also very fast. I have no complaints so far and I'm very glad I got this air fryer.

¬†I was looking for an affordable airfryer which can meet needs of my family. The size is good enough for our family. Since I bought the airfryer I use it every day and fully satisfied with the result and taste of cooked food. I like that cooking basket is separable from the main part. I prefer don't use dishwasher, it will let me use it much longer, this is what I think. May be I am wrong. But it is dishwasher safe. I love that I can set different temperatures and time for the various ingredients, but I don't have to because can set it as recommended. But I shake french fries during of preparation time, it gives better result and cooks evenly. I like that it turns off automatically when I take out container with a preparing food. I prefer to use air fryer then my huge oven which gives a lots of heat in our house. I don't like to use much oil in my meals so love this one for giving me this opportunity. So far I love it and enjoying to prepare food for my lovely family.

¬†I'm a fan of deep fried foods. I even have a restaurant quality double deep fryer in my kitchen. So the thought of frying food without oil made me skeptical. This Air Fryer completely threw me for a loop and changed my mind. The unit is really great and easy to use. No more waiting for the oil to come up to temperature or gettingsplattered with hot oil.. There's presets already programmed into it to speed things up and make cooking certain things easier. Things like steak and fries (even frozen fries) are just the push of a button. The basket is large enough to cook for an average family. The unit is 1,500 watts and has a temperature range of 180 to 380 degrees. It comes with a cook book which is helpful, especially if Air Frying is new to you. When your finished clean up is easy because nothing sticks to the basket. It's even dishwasher safe. If you're looking to eat healthy and have been considering an Air Fryer, I absolutely recommend getting one of these.

I have to say I was skeptical on getting an air fryer but surly I am so glad I did. Cooking time is very quick and also you have to pay almost no attention to it. So far I have cooked two things.
1. Chicken legs
These came out cooked well and tasted great. Dash on a small bit of olive oil for that crispy taste.
2. Steaks
This is the part that got me. The steaks were cooked to perfection. Cooked evenly medium rare steaks. It beeps half way through, this will allow you to turn your food over.
This thing is convenient. Wish I had this in college!

I previously purchased an air fryer and fell in love with it. However it‚Äôs a bit of an odd shape it‚Äôs a circle. And I know my grandparents and mom both want air fryers so I purchased this one to give to them but I might keep it for myself because it looks so cool and works really well. I like the temperature control options and the shape of the rack more. I also find it‚Äôs easier to clean if you place parchment paper in the bottom but don‚Äôt do that if it‚Äôs empty because it will burn. Definitely recommend if you‚Äôre wanting to try one.

¬†I've wanted an air fryer since I saw a video channel I used to watch using one,but they're pricey so I didn't buy one for awhile. I finally caved in,and I am loving it. It is a bit bulky so it may not be on the countertop when we move,since the kitchen is super tiny,but it will get plenty of use nonetheless. The first use was just some frozen fries so I could test the features button,and they came out great. The photos & video are my cinnamon sugar donuts I made for the first time,the fryer did an excellent job. I really like that the baskets are dishwasher safe,they're easy to clean with just soap and water as well,I've done both. Today I'm going to be making cauliflower bites and fried pickles,but I do plan on making healthier meals and sides afterwards,the whole house is excited about & have been using this fryer,which is great since at first they were skeptical of how stuff would turn out with a 'new cooking method.' This is also perfect for hot days when the stove and oven really aren't a viable option,and it saves on utility bills compared to a stove/oven as long as you unplug it when finished,would be a great college or apartment item.

reviews.reviewTitle: Jump on the airfryer bandwagon guys ü§£
reviews.reviewText: Yep, totally jumped on the airfryer bandwagon. Over the years I‚Äôve usually stuck to mainly cooking Chinese food and with Chinese food we don‚Äôt have a lot of fried food but after living on my own for a few years I‚Äôve started to learn how to cook other types of food. So far I‚Äôve only made a few things in it like hash browns but they turned out great and I love that it didn‚Äôt feel so heavy and greasy like when you fry it. I loaded my hash browns with some sour cream, cheese, avocado and a little meat and it was super good ! I also have made salmon in it but not with the fish preset function since I don‚Äôt like my salmon too cooked so I changed the time but kept the temp the same as the fish preset. My only issue is that the airfryer takes up quite a bit of counter space so I hope you have some extra cabinet space to put this bad boy away when not in use. I‚Äôm excited to try different stuff with my new gadget !

I rated it 5 stars because it is a great asset for my kitchen. I also ordered additional air fryer accessories, and now experimenting with fixing different delicious and healthy meals. We are a family of 3, and it's a perfect size for us.
Design is also very stylish, and looks like a spaceship in my kitchen. I am glad I gave it a try. Highly recommend if you're looking into healthier options for your diet. It really takes so much less oil!
It is also so much faster than a traditional skillet cooking. I overcooked things at first because I thought "there is no way this meat can be ready in 10 minutes, let me put it at least on 15", guess what, it was DRY then, and the best time actually was 7 minutes! But I figure my way out as I go, and it's okay.
I also appreciate how it is odorless (my house is small so it's important) and mess free. No more oil squirting all around my counter!

This cooks like a dream, in about half the time of what it takes in the oven! Those minutes add up to so much time saved! The tater tots, fries, and hush puppies came out so very crispy but tender inside. It was never that crispy straight from the oven.

I've always been intrigued about air fryers, but I didn't feel like I needed one when I already have an oven. That is, until I finally tried it myself. And boy, now I understand why everyone loves it! :)

Also, this Bagotte air fryer is a cut above the rest because of a number of things: it has clear instructions and a bonus recipe book! A lot of products online never have decent instructions, and I'm glad this one does.

The only con I can think of is it's bigger than I imagined and takes up a lot of counter space, but we definitely made room for it. Very happy with this purchase.

I placed manual airfyer to this one. The previous airfryer did not have this many options. This one has a one-button system where you can easily use the presets to cook certain popular dishes. I love doing wontons in this airfryer. They come out crisp, and absolutely delicious. The clean-up was pretty easy. Just take out the bottom holder and wash. Healthy is the new sexy, and this airfryer helps us make healthier choices. The container is pretty big, so we are able to fit more food in this one without having to do multiple

I love my Bagotte air fryer! This versatile appliance still air fry, reheat, roast and dehydrate your foods. For me, the most useful functions are frying and dehydrating. I made chicken drumsticks the first day I got it and they were really delicious and crispy but not greasy at all. Also dehydrated some mushrooms and they were wonderful when added to a soup I made.
The unit is well constructed, rugged but not too heavy to move around. Very easy to operate with very clear instructions included. A very nice cookbook was included with lots of good recipes and clear cooking instructions. Overall, this is nice addition to our kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great buy. Saved us lots of money , don't need to buy lunch
reviews.reviewText:
So my boss asked me to purchase an air fryer for our pantry. Lot of choices but I picked this one as it compliments the color of the pantry counter. There's a lot of cheaper ones than this but I went ahead and bought it. I have bought cbaby cameras from this brand - (gift incentive requested by employees) and so far the quality is ok. So the brand is quite familiar on our office.
Overall worked as expected. Did its job, we also saved a lot not buying lunch outside. cooks meals without being very messy. Very very good buy, now we need another one because everyone wants to use it at the same time. It is also very easy to clean

reviews.reviewTitle: This Air Fryer is a Life Changer!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is one of the best investments ever! It has a big compartment for food that allows you to put in more than enough food for yourself and others. It has settings that have automatic times and temperatures, that can be adjusted manually, for easy cooking! It helps save so much time! It comes with a recipe book that gives you many ways to cook with it! The best part about it is that it its compartments can be put in the dishwasher! Tip: Do not press the eject button when taking the compartment out! 20/10 product!

¬†I was a bit skeptical at first, especially worrying about the taste.

Since it came, we‚Äôve really changed our diet. It‚Äôs amazing how easy it is to use, and in particular clean. Without the added oil, it‚Äôs just a quick wash and done! It‚Äôs hard to imagine our kitchen without it anymore, especially after trying a few potato varieties.
I love that has already some options I o set and is very silence
Highly recommended!

Ever tried cooking frozen fries in an oven? It takes forever! And they don't crisp up. The air fryer is amazing for crispy and delicious frozen fries. It only takes about 20 minutes and there you have it - deep fried like fries but without the oil.

We love our new air fryer, it is easy to use and has lots of different settings. We also cook chicken drumsticks in the air fryer and they come out perfect with crispy skin. Definitely recommend!

¬†I try to eat a healthy foods, but I really like fried potatoes and chicken and my son love fries. but in fried foods a lot of oil and chalesterol is not good for us. When I bought air frier it became our favorite subject in the kitchenüòÇ. we cook with air frier every day. and it is very tasty! even tastier than with oil! And it‚Äôs easy to cook and clean. I am really happy with my new air frier.

Very happy with my new air fryer. I had wanted one of these for years and finally got the chance to find this really good one, here on Amazon. I can cook up French fries, make mozzarella sticks, I can even dehydrate meat for my husband and all kinds of other recipes simple and easy. It came with a recipe book and all the parts that I needed to have a really good air frying experience. It cleans up nice too. Very satisfied with my purchase.

¬†This air fryer is great kitchen addition. I have cooked bacon , steak,chicken and potato with this and I haven‚Äôt had any issues with it. I also have tried some of recipes and they all came out great.
It is easy to use and wash . It cook quickly and it is not noisy; you can just hear the air moving. It works like convenient oven. I am very happy with this air fryer.

I always wanted a air fryer and now I finally got one, I love this product, I love how easy it is to use it and to clean it. It came with instructions and it was really easy to follow. The food does turns out better in the air fryer , it‚Äôs more crispy, less oil, and it‚Äôs more healthier. I thought I would be too small when I came through the mail but it turns out to be the perfect size! Highly recommend this product!!

I was so excited to finally get an air fryer and it's great! I just have it for myself but if you're using it to cook for a family you might need a bigger size. Easy to use and works really well. I made some awesome tempura fish tacos and the fish turned out great - I'd probably use more battery next time but it came out brown and crispy and not overdone. Very excited to try other stuff in the air fryer

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good quality, I recommend it
reviews.reviewText:
I can cook anything with this, and it's also great for cooking french fries and nuggets in fast food places. I love the touch screen function, it makes it look very high tech! It's easy and using it heats up very fast and what I love about using this is that I'm pretty sure my hands are safe from oil splashes.
I will definitely use this as a healthier way to cook food too.

Since everyone is talking about how great the electric air fryer it is, and I saw my sister's electric air fryer is really nice. I get this 3.7 QT air fryer. I love it! I can cook my hashbrowns, fries, bacon, Mozzarella sticks and more with less oil. I also tried to cook the shrimps, steaks, pork chops and it all working great. I don't need to smell the oil smell in my bedroom anymore.

¬†This is a 3.4 quart air fryer which actually works!
Air fryer is a device which basically acts like a small electric oven and uses forced air to speeden up the process.
This one is stylish and comes with 6 preset options which can be used to substitute similar items.
Air fryer works best for frozen food which needs deep frying!

This is such a nice air fryer! I love the crispyness of food when it‚Äôs fried but it‚Äôs so unhealthy and hurts my stomach to the point it‚Äôs just not worth it. This gives me the crisp and crunch I‚Äôm craving but without all the fatty unhealthiness of deep frying so I can have some of my favorite foods again. I can‚Äôt wait to cook even more with it and find new recipes on Pinterest!

¬†Great product, cooks evenly and proficient. I love how sleek this looks and it's comparable in price to other air fryers. Easy to use and my son can use it too. We have another that you turn the knob for temp and then for time, this is digital and much easier to use and see what you are doing. We live this abdbit bigger than the one we had.

¬†It's really good size and heats up fast. I bought for my mom and I'm hoping she loves it because she wanted one. So this is the simplest I can do for her and shes a elderly so I think this is perfect and easy for her to understand. Simple to clean. Might get another for my sister. But overall this is great üòÅ

reviews.reviewTitle: Very convenient and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: My friend recommended me this air fryer and I am really happy with the purchase. Frankly I'm not a very good cook, so it's really important to me that this product makes cooking fast and easy. So far so good. The little cook book is a good bonus. Made chicken breast and banana bread today and it took maybe an hour all together

This air flyer is so easy to operate. Modern design with led touchscreen display. Oil free and healthy cooking still can cook quickly and crispy. Really time saver and does frozen food really well. Enough long wire and detachable nonstick basket made it easy to clean and convenient. Work perfectly. Price reasonable.

I ordered this Air Fryer so I can start cooking healthier. I so wish I has ordered sooner! This Air Fryer is so easy to use. The instructions are complete which is great. I have fried chicken and zucchini, plus much more. The chicken legs only took 15 minutes and the outside was as crispy as frying in a skillet. Love it!

I read a lot of comments before I decided to buy it! Really didn't let me down! It is so amazing! Just spray a little oil on the surface. So fast! Save fuel and save time! My chicken and chips are so crisp! Just a little oil or even not needed! Super healthy! I am very enjoyable! Absolutely five stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great deal for a large air fryer
reviews.reviewText: this air fryer has very big capacity, can cook meals for 2 people. Digital display looks nice and hopefully it can functioning as long as those mechanical buttons. The bottom pan tray has two pieces and easy to separate them for cleaning. It can be dishwashed but I am comfortable with hand wash.

The air fryer is easy to use. All the instructions and times are on the display screen. Pretty easy to set up and the bucket is large so you can do a big amount of food. I have done chicken, potato, and fish and the heat is working very well. Food is already done perfectly and cook thoroughly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mine came what appeared to be used
reviews.reviewText:
I havent decided whether I am going to send this back. It came opened up, the basket itself is scratched, no cookbook or instructions, and the top was dirty with fingerprints.

Having said that, it does make pretty good fries. But I am a bit ticked so might get another brand.

¬†I can't believe it took me this long to get an air fryer. Not only did my food cook much faster than it ever has in the oven, but it is a lot more crispier. This was a great investment and it is much healthier than frying food in grease.

Really fancy fryer. I used it to make french fries. They came out good. I used the recipe book which came with it and I followed exact instructions.

I also like design and touch panel, really looks cool!! Not stick inside side was very easy to clean.

¬†It‚Äôs very good air fryer really I like it and my wife loves it , takes little oil to frying 2 pounds of potatoes , able to frying whole chicken, so easy to clean it , not heavy if wanna to change their place.

After doing lots of research, I purchased this product and the meat it cooked was DELICIOUS and healthy as well! From the bottom of the pan you can definitely tell how much oil it squeegee out from the meat itself! I love this product so much!

I have used this air fryer several times and everything I have made comes out perfect. Fully cooked on the inside and crispy on the outside. Receipe provided along with the product is simply best. It comes apart easily and clean up is a snap

Firstly, I really like this one, it is very easy to use and very quickly. However, it was not non-stick frying-pan. After using 3 times, it became like this. I dont know if air fryer has a same problem but I have to return it. So sad!

reviews.reviewTitle: OMG, Literally the Best Pork Chop I‚Äôve Ever Had.
reviews.reviewText:
Just got my Baggotte today. I came home from work super tired but wanted to try out this baby! So I made pork chops in it. I seasoned them and lightly floured 3 large pork chops (no oil at all) at 360 degrees for 30 minutes‚Äîperfection!

Where have y‚Äôall been all my life?

I am surprised at this product. Its so easy to use, not complex like other electronic products. I have my seafood, bread or meat grilled just very fast and no fat left. It is also easy to clean. Love it!
I love how easy it is to use, and I use it on a daily basis. Whether I'm making chicken nuggets or french fries, it works perfectly every time. I put everything in this. Works well for veggies too.

¬†So useful thing! I‚Äôm so happy to have such amazing helper. Very good quality and easy to use! Really safe my time and health.
Also great modern design.
I have owned many air fryers and this one is the best so far. I can make very crispy chicken wings, fries,... very easily. I love that it's also very easy to clean and use. Perfection!
This is the first time i used air fryer. I liked it because i can fry fries with a little amount of oil so i can eat healthy fries. The taste and flavor is also satisfactory.
¬†This is a magical item for the kitchen. My hubby loves a lot. He loves eating healthy and this has been his health keeper. He just loves it.
This is my first time using air fryer and I like it so far. I made some chicken dumplings and they came out great. I used 1st setting and just watched them.
This works so well! All my friends were raving about how wonderful it is to have that fried texture without all the gross oil and this machine does the trick!
I really like this stylish and practical home kitchen appliance. It does not use oil for fried foods. It can save cooking oil and is good for health.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast cook and easy to usr
reviews.reviewText: This air fry is very easy to set up and make the food ready very quickly. We have used it to make chicken wings and it is so delicious with this air fry.
I have one at home and this one is for the office. I just received it today and could not wait to have some chicken nuggets. Huge capacity. It is beautiful.
This air fryer is awesome! Until now we used it twice. We have cooked French fries and nuggets. It is great. The programmed options, the ease of using and cleaning.
The design is really nice. It is so useful. Only one spoon of oil is enough. It is much healthier than fried stuff. I loved it. I would really recommend it.
¬†Love it! Really healthy and does a great job. Love the color and sleek look !
Absolutely awesome! Made perfect fries...Made unbelievable wings!
This air fryer is great. It easy to maintain and use than a traditional deep fryers. It save my time to cooking. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this Air Fryer! Great for seafood and vegetables
reviews.reviewText: Made a lot of great meals with this ‚Äì all super fast and easy.
¬†I have had this for less than a year and it‚Äôs not working anymore.... also the basket is all rusted already. And I paid more that what is selling for now, save your money

reviews.reviewTitle: Seemed good, now not too sure.
reviews.reviewText:
The first use was amazing. Made wings and they were so crispy and delicious.
A few days later, went to use it for the second time and the metal fan inside started making a horrible metal on metal rubbing sound.
Will update on function as we continue to use it.

qAndA.question: Is the basket stainless steel or metal?
qAndA.answer: It's not stainless steel, becareful not to damage the non-stick coating.

qAndA.question: Does anybody know the measurements? Thanks.
qAndA.answer: 14‚Äù high and diameter

qAndA.question: Is this oilless? is it mean I don't need to put any oil to make it fry?Can I use this product to reheat leftover pizza, wings or any other fried f
qAndA.answer:
Dear customer
We are happy to assist you with your inquiry about Bagotte 3.7QT White Air Fryer.
‚Ä¶ see more

qAndA.question: How much food does it cook at once? Anyone have examples? I have a family of 3.
qAndA.answer: three large potatoes, three pieces of fish, about 2 lg stake cut in pices. overall very good size for family of 3

qAndA.question: Is the any warranty on this air fryer?
qAndA.answer: I think so.

qAndA.question: How loud is this unit?
qAndA.answer: It's comparable to the low fan vent setting on our stove. We are just fine with it, but this is our first air fryer so can't say how it compares with other units.

qAndA.question: what are the dimentions of the fryer's basket?
qAndA.answer: I don‚Äôt know, but is big for a family of four

qAndA.question: Does the basket get stuck when cooking? Ive had a problem in the past that when I'm cooking and pull out the drawer, it sticks when pushing back in.
qAndA.answer: Nope. No issue with that thus far!

qAndA.question: How much food does this hold ?
qAndA.answer: A lot

qAndA.question: How long is warranty on air fryer? Return policy?
qAndA.answer: I think 18 months

qAndA.question: Should the basket be seasoned like you would a non-stick pan?
qAndA.answer: You can if you want, but you don‚Äôt have to if you don‚Äôt want to.

qAndA.question: can i fry 2 burgers at one time?
qAndA.answer: small ones, yes. not the super burgers but ones bun sized before cooking yes

qAndA.question: Does the taflon peel off on the basket??
qAndA.answer: Not yet

qAndA.question: Can this cook frozen food like chicken and beef?
qAndA.answer: it can, it comes with a book with some setting but I find blogs with recommended times for different meats. I can put chicken tenders straight into it, on the higher time for chicken and don't have any issues.

qAndA.question: Does Bagotte air fryer come with recipes?
qAndA.answer: Yes,with a recipe book.

qAndA.question: Is the outside white or stainless? Thank you.
qAndA.answer: Mine is white outside.

qAndA.question: Do you need to season the basket with coconut oil before using the first time?
qAndA.answer: I don‚Äôt see that being a requirement anywhere.

qAndA.question: how many chicken wing sections can it cook at a time?
qAndA.answer:
You can stick a lot in there, but usually you only want around 8 - 10 at a time. Otherwise, they don't cook evenly because they're stacked on top of each other.

It really depends on the size of the wings/drums. Get the party wings, if possible.

qAndA.question: How many minutes can you cook foods using this?
qAndA.answer: Depends on what you are cooking, raw meats (fish, chicken) 15-20 mins. Finger foods take about 10 to 15 mins.

qAndA.question: Can this do breaded foods? like if I make a batter and fry up some fish or cheese curds?
qAndA.answer: so far I have only used frozen battered food, and it works great, I would lightly freeze what I was cooking if it is battered first. I have make boneless chicken thighs that were not frozen and they were really good, but they were not battered. I think if the batter isn't partially frozen it would me very messy.

qAndA.question: How does it compare in cooking times with a deep fryer?
qAndA.answer: It's much healthier and taste better

qAndA.question: Is there any plastic on the interior of the fryer that?
qAndA.answer: Not that I see

qAndA.question: can you open the basket to check the food in the middle of cooking cycle?
qAndA.answer: Yes, the fryer will actually beep at the halfway point indicating that you should shake the basket and you can also open the basket at any time and it will resume whee it left off.

qAndA.question: How easy is it to clean?
qAndA.answer: Very

qAndA.question: Is it easy to cleanÔºü Is it dishwasher safe?
qAndA.answer:
Thank you for this question! Yes, Bagotte 3.7QT Air Fryer is easy to clean,dishwasher safe. If you add much sauce and oil, you can layer the foil on the basket, which will make cleaning a lot easier.
Hope this helps! If any further question you have, feel free to contact us through Amazon Message.

qAndA.question: Can I roast a whole chiken with a few potatoes in it?
qAndA.answer: probably not

qAndA.question: Will raw, french fried cut potatoes get the crispy finish or only the frozen ones?
qAndA.answer: Yes delicious!

qAndA.question: For a family of three, what size would you recommend?
qAndA.answer: The 3.5L is a great size for a family of three. Cooked it for three on several occasions with plenty of room to spare.

qAndA.question: How many chicken wings can you cook at once ?
qAndA.answer: Haven‚Äôt cooked wings only legs

qAndA.question: Does it leave oil smell?
qAndA.answer: no

qAndA.question: Is it noisy?
qAndA.answer: Actually it does made some noisy! Like Bibi sound!

qAndA.question: Has anyone cooked shrimp or fish with this? I live in Mississippi and seafood is a staple.
qAndA.answer: yes

qAndA.question: Is it easy to cleanÔºü Is it dishwasher safe?
qAndA.answer: Don,t know, I don‚Äôt use the dishwasher

qAndA.question: Can you fry fish in this air fryer?
qAndA.answer: The first time I tried breaded fish it didn‚Äôt work well. It stuck to the lightly sprayed surface. I think if I had pre-heated it would work better. I tried fresh trout , unbreaded with a light spray of Olive Oil and seasoning and it was delish.
